summary: Waiting for job feedback from company while committing to selective search for roles that truly fit me

wins: Maintained standards - didn't compromise on job suitability
Prepared contingency plans if current opportunity falls through
losses: Felt anxious about repeated 'tomorrow' delays from company
Wasted time checking for updates instead of being productive
ideas: Research companies that align with my skills and values
Create a 'non-negotiable' checklist for ideal job criteria

short-term: Follow up professionally if no update by tomorrow
Dedicate 1 hour to networking in my target niche (Nagar opportunities)

long-term: Develop portfolio/blog to attract suitable roles
Build 3-month financial runway for selective job search

triggerEvents: Observing peers in mismatched jobs reinforced my selective approach
symptomChecklist: Nervous energy (restless legs, difficulty sitting still)
